segment.source: Manage app access to Office 365 services
segment.target: Manage app access to Office 365 services

segment.source: Manage app access to Office 365 services
segment.target: Manage app access to Office 365 services

segment.source: How app access can protect your data
segment.target: How app access can protect your data

segment.source: With MAM policies, you can configure policies that prevent corporate data from being transferred to the device or to non-protected apps.
segment.target: With MAM policies, you can configure policies that prevent corporate data from being transferred to the device or to non-protected apps.

segment.source: With app access restrictions, access to company cloud resources like Exchange Online and SharePoint online can be managed.
segment.target: With app access restrictions, access to company cloud resources like Exchange Online and SharePoint online can be managed.

segment.source: You can configure which apps should be allowed access to your cloud resources and only those apps will be able to access the resource.
segment.target: You can configure which apps should be allowed access to your cloud resources and only those apps will be able to access the resource.

segment.source: If the end-user tries to access using other apps, access is blocked.
segment.target: If the end-user tries to access using other apps, access is blocked.

segment.source: When you select Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint in the allowed app list all the supported apps including OneNote will be automatically included in the allowed app list for both iOS and Android.
segment.target: When you select Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint in the allowed app list all the supported apps including OneNote will be automatically included in the allowed app list for both iOS and Android.
